comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: His correct name: Maximilian Ritter von Höhn (not von Bohn) (18.08.1859 - 26.04.1936) place of birth: Kitzingen, Unterfranken (Bavarian Franconia) Königreich Bayern: General der Artillerie see home.comcast.net/~jcviser/aka/hoehn.htm

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: The Bavarian State Library has a page on him: verwaltungshandbuch.bayerische-landesbibliothek-online.de...

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Thanks B-59 for pointing out the misspelling. We'll correct that and include his full name.
